So i said

LETS LIGHT THIS BABY UP!!!

Just using good ol Cart mod...I was first using the Flood light mod, but they werent at the proper angles to light up the launch vehicle. So i just used these.

I had the idea to make light towers to get them to light up the tower proprely...but didnt work out (hard to move them and flipped over countless times)

> ![boL5H.png](http://i.imgur.com/boL5H.png)
Very good. I assume you maneuvered them manually? Care to share the craft file and mod list?
How do you get that UI?

> 
> How do you get that UI?

New feature .15. Some parts will have a right-click menu that will show you some of their stats - in this case, how many units of fuel are left.
That\'s phenomenal. I must set something similar up.

There have been those who have said that night launches are quite possibly the best and most beautiful part of working a space program. I couldn\'t agree more. I do hope Squad has something in mind to make this more permanent.
